QuestData.Title: Gormaul Tower
QuestData.Description: It is time for us to strike out against those who would enslave us!$b$bWe travel to Gormaul Tower to wrest it from the Bladespire ogres. I would welcome your company.$b$bMount up, and together we will ride to battle!
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Gormaul Tower from the Bladespire ogres.
QuestData.RewardText: I now understand how you were able to rescue my clan from the clutches of slavery. Such power!
